Name: FriendShip
About the game: You and your friends (multiplayer, cross-platform) are in command of a ship and must work together to keep the ship afloat. Step 1: Join a game! Step 2: Follow the commands! Step 3: Shout out commands you don't have! Step 4: Best Friends Forever! NOTE: This is only for the HTC Vive. There is an Oculus version released on the Oculus Home Store. Produced by:
Meta Description: Looking for information on FriendShip? Check out the release date (Dec 16, 2016), developer insights from Grayson Malinowski,Jesse Homa,Louis Fairgrieve...
